drivers.name: ptouch
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

CUPS raster driver for Brother's P-Touch label printers.

Foomatic data to generate the PPD files is included with the driver, therefore we do not provide this data and PPDs here on the OpenPrinting site.

notes:
Prints 10mm per second.

Consumables/Refills: Black on White Thermal Paper
Fabric Tape Blue on White
Flexi Tape
Iron on Black Tape
Security Tape Black on White
Strong Adhesive Tape
TZ tape widths w: 1=6mm, 2=9mm, 3=12mm, 4=18mm, 5=24mm
TZ foreground colours f: 1=black, 2=red, 3=blue, 4=gold, 5=white
TZ background colours b: 1=clear, 2=white, 3=black, 4=red, 5=blue, 6=yellow, 7=green, 8=gold
